events.name: An Introduction To Big Data & Hadoop
events.description: Following the last two successful introduction sessions, Singapore IoE/ATC Meetup group is inviting its member to another similar WebEx session by KnowBigData. An Introduction To Big Data & Hadoop Understanding Big data is is one of the key elements in the entire IoT chain, from data collection, to data processing and then relevant action. This is an important topic which anyone working in IoT/IoE area should be familiar with. In this 3 hrs Webex, Founder and Chief Instructor of KnowBig Data- Sandeep Giri will be covering following topics: Sandeep will take up as many questions as possible while covering the introduction on Hadoop and Big data, and will answers them patiently :) + Introduction to Big Data + What, Why and When - Hadoop? + Hadoop - Design Goals, Architecture + Getting Started, Simple Examples and Advanced Teasers • Date: Saturday, 7th March' 15 • Time: 11:00am- 2:00 pm SGT Please register by clicking at following link: An Introduction To Big Data & Hadoop

events.name: Drone Fun March Meetup
events.description: Bring your drones and let's have fun flying together! Event is open to all experience levels from beginner to experienced pilots - we encourage everyone to share their knowledge, experience and ideas with each other to help everyone maximise the amount of fun they can have! Activities will be decided on the day, based on weather and turnout. Open to any suggestions! Location is the green space to the South East of Marina Bay Gardens - check the maps above for avoidance of doubt. Contact me if you get lost - number is in the location info. Don't forget to bring all your spare batteries, and chargers, and cold beers also encouraged! N.B. This is all 'weather permitting', if the weather looks sketchy, then we'll relocate to somewhere nearby for coffee or something... I'll post an update earlier on in the day if it's a NG. N.B. This is a privately organised event and not a commercial venture. All participants participate at their own risk and liability.
